content.heading: Function Overloading
paragraphs:
With function overloading, multiple functions can have the same name with different
parameters:
Consider the following example, which have two functions that add numbers of different type:
Instead of defining two functions that should do the same thing, it is better to overload one.

In the example below, we overload the plusFunc function to work for both int 
and double:

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
int myFunction(int x)float myFunction(float x)double 
  myFunction(double x, double y)

content.heading: Example
